        public void validateNoDuplicateQueryStringParams(Map<String,String[]> parameterMap,
                                                 String... parametersToCheck)
                                          throws IllegalArgumentException
        Validates that the query string parameters aren't duplicated for a list of expected parameters.
        Parameters:
        parameterMap - the query string parameter map.
        parametersToCheck - the query string parameters to check.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any duplicates were found.
